card_text: Apply these effects, in sequence, depending on the type(s) of "Borrel" monsters you control and in your GY. If you control a monster with 3000 or more ATK, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation.$N●Fusion: Banish 1 monster your opponent controls.$N●Synchro: Banish 3 random face-down cards from your opponent's Extra Deck, face-up.$N●Xyz: Banish 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.$N●Link: Banish up to 3 cards from your opponent's GY.$NYou can only activate 1 "Bayonet Punisher" per turn.
